Question: Within ten days this person had announced her separation from Miller, and Gable had died from a heart attack.
Hints: On May 4, 2007, a New York judge ruled that this person's rights of publicity ended at her death.
This person was soon cast in a major role in the low-budget musical Ladies of the Chorus (1948).
On June 29, 1956, this person married playwright Arthur Miller, in a civil ceremony in White Plains, New York.
